ygData.subject: Hell levels
ygData.msgSnippet: I keep hearing about 30 being a hell level for folks.  Bah!  My hell level is 28.  Why?  I can t find anything to solo unless it s in a train-filled dungeon
ygData.messageBody:
I keep hearing about 30 being a "hell level" for folks. Bah! My hell level
is 28. Why? I can't find anything to solo unless it's in a train-filled
dungeon :o/ I would do giant skels in Rathe mtns, but they are never there.
I kill lizards, but only HGs and one-eyes pop up (although I will remeber
that fact when I'm in my lower 30's) I've thought about gargoyles in OOT,
but have never been there, nor have I any experiance vs. gargoyels (in this
game). Anyone with any ideas on a nice quiet place a level 28 bard can solo
his way to his lev song?


-=B=-
28th on The Rathe
